text: Yā pana bhikkhunī purisena saddhiṃ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṃ kappeyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī purisena saddhiṃ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṃ kappeyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 125. Should any bhikkhunī sit in private on a secluded seat with a man, it is to be confessed.
